bibliography.title: Study of Thermal Decomposition of Poly(Vinyl Chloride) Type Polymers with the Use of Model Substances - II Pyrolysis of Trans -1,3-Dichloro-1-pentene, Trans-5-Chloro-3-heptene, Cis-4-Chloro-2-pentene and Stereoisomers of 2,4-Dichloropentane in the Gas Phase
